snippet: According to the fine print, students might have to pay thousands of dollars out of pocket, and wait months or years before being reimbursed.
abstract: Starbucks' tuition program faces criticism for drawbacks in the fine print--notably that students could have to pay thousands of dollars out of pocket, and wait months or years before being reimbursed; program now applies only to Arizona State’s online courses.
lead_paragraph: According to the fine print, students might have to pay thousands of dollars out of pocket, and wait months or years before being reimbursed.

headline.main: Critics Point to Drawbacks in Starbucks Tuition Program
headline.print_headline: Critics Point to Drawbacks in Starbucks Tuition Program
